adHeader: 'I can MOVE and DELIVER your HOUSEHOLD ITEM or FURNITURE PIECE
adDetails: I am ready to help you move almost anything!Furniture, couches, Bed/box spring combos, yard items, ect. Store Pick up / returns, Single item moves, Couches, Mattresses, etc. ""SMALL MOVES"" OR ""SINGLE ITEM"" MOVE NOT A PROBLEM Additional workers for bigger jobs (LOADING/UNLOADING PODS, UHAULS, STORAGE) and references available. Call for a quote or if you have any questions. Included is all the safety and moving equipment needed for your job: ropes, pads, tarps, straps, dollies, etc. I am friendly, reliable, professional!!
